mapper.insert: insert into account (login_name, user_name, identity_number, pay_user_id, pay_account_id, balance, freeze, point, register_time, membership_point) value(#{loginName}, #{userName}, #{identityNumber}, #{payUserId}, #{payAccountId}, #{balance}, #{freeze}, #{point}, #{registerTime}, #{membershipPoint})
mapper.select: select * from account where login_name = #{loginName} for update
mapper.update: update account set balance = #{balance}, freeze = #{freeze}, auto_invest = #{autoInvest}, auto_repay = #{autoRepay}, no_password_invest = #{noPasswordInvest}, point = #{point}, membership_point = #{membershipPoint} where login_name = #{loginName}
mapper.select: select login_name from account where (if(length(identity_number) = 18, substring(identity_number,11,4), substring(identity_number,9,4))) = DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%m%d')
select login_name from account where (if(length(identity_number) = 18, substring(identity_number,11,2), substring(identity_number,9,2))) = DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%m')
select login_name, balance from account order by id ASC limit #{startLimit}, #{endLimit}
